name: Ioannis Stavrakakis
content: Ioannis Stavrakakis' Homepage [Homepage | Bio-CV | Courses | People | Publications | Research/Funding | Seminars/Presentations] National and Kapodistrian University of Athens (NKUA) Department of  Informatics & Telecommunications (DIT) NETwork Technologies, Services and Applications (NETSA-Lab) Ioannis Stavrakakis, Professor IEEE Fellow Board of Trustees member of IMDEA Networks (Spain) Senior Editor of Computer Communications Journal Visiting Professor Politecnico di Torino (2019, Italy) Chair of Excellence UC3M/Santander (2018, Spain) Chair of Excellence Comunidad de Madrid (2017, Spain) Mercator Fellow of DFG MAKI Centre at TU Darmstadt (2017-2020, Germany) Editor of IEEE Proceedings (2015-2020) Chair of Dept of Informatics and Telecommunications, NKUA (2012-2016, Greece) Chair of IFIP TC6.3:Performance of Communication Systems (2003-2008) Editor of IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking (2001 - 2008) Associate Professor at Northeastern University (1994-1999, Boston, USA) Assistant Professor at the University of Vermont (1988-1994, Burlington, USA) Contact Information: Department of Informatics and Telecommunications National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, Panepistimiopolis, Ilisia, 16122, Athens, Greece.
